[Scope]
This policy applies to all Company systems.

[Policy]
1. The Company will delete stored data when it is no longer needed for business purposes.
2. This policy must be reviewed annually.

[Required Inputs]

[Scope]
This policy applies to changes that are deployed.

[Policy]
1. All changes must be approved before deployment.
2. Emergency changes may be deployed first and approved after.
3. Approval records must be retained.
